news.title: Post-mortem is ‘key’ as criminal investigation launched into death of man (51) allegedly pushed by garda in Dublin city centre
news.summary: A post-mortem examination on the body of a 51-year-old man who died after he was allegedly pushed by a garda in Dublin are “absolutely key” to what direction the investigation takes.

news.title: Mary Regan: Expect many more twists in presidential campaign after Heather Humphreys races ahead of Seán Kelly
news.summary: Seán Kelly was enjoying Oasis in Croke Park on Saturday night. And well he might, given he was the man whose strategising resulted in the opening up of the stadium for outside games and events such as this, when he was president of the GAA in 2005.

news.title: College accommodation crisis: cheapest and most expensive rooms revealed as Dublin students face paying 50pc more for on-campus options
news.summary: Students in Dublin can pay 50pc more for on-campus rooms at third-level institutions than in the rest of the country as demand outstrips supply, an  Irish Independent  survey has found.

news.title: ‘Women can do whatever we want… we don't need to go to college’ – Laois Rose Katelyn Cummins named 2025 Rose of Tralee
news.summary: Katelyn Cummins from Co Laois has been crowned the 2025 Rose of Tralee.

news.title: Marc Champion: Donald Trump thinks Ukraine negotiations are all about him, and it makes him an easy mark for Vladimir Putin
news.summary: In the 1963 war movie  The Great Escape , 76 prisoners make it out of their camp in what begins with hope and elation, but ends with all but a handful killed or recaptured.

news.title: I knew the ability was there, but for a while I couldn’t figure out how to get it out – How Tipp’s John McGrath bounced back
news.summary: John McGrath put more pressure on himself than he usually would ahead of Tipperary’s Munster championship opener against Limerick this year in the knowledge that if he didn’t take his chance, “it could be the last one you get for the summer.”

news.title: Eoin McGee answers: ‘I’m a struggling single mum about to receive an inheritance of €150k. How do I make the most of it for me and my three children?’
The daily challenges of co-parenting: ‘It’s overwhelming but I’ve learned that it doesn’t have to mean conflict’
news.summary: In the early days of pregnancy with my son, I went on a weekend trip to Paris with his dad. I remember us sitting by the Eiffel Tower, full of nerves and excitement, imagining what kind of parents we would be.

news.title: Operation renovation: ‘I wanted a house that looked like it might have always been there’
news.summary: Niall Mc Guire is the owner of a historic home in Armagh, Northern Ireland. He is known for his passion for 'ruins' which he fell in love with when he found his home.

news.title: The Irish Independent’s view: As race for Áras truly gets up and running, we can look forward to dignified contest
news.summary: Former minister Heather Humphreys appeared to have had enough of her self-imposed gardening leave, while MEP Seán Kelly had eaten his own words that “a day out of Kerry is a day wasted”.
